{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = BeagleBone Enhanced |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.sancloud.co.uk/beaglebone-enhanced-bbe |ppalt = (SC) |pp2 = https://beagleboard.org/enhanced |pp2alt = (BB) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SanCloud_BeagleBone_Enhanced_WiFi_V1G |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SanCloud |model = BeagleBone Enhanced |submodelappend = yes |submodel = WiFi |revision = V1G |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3358;(AM3358BZCZ100); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAJCN-1M; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K512M8DA-107; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:66:9D |oui = 18:BB:26
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.71;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, Micro HDMI, SPI, I2C, GPIO, temperature sensor, accelerometer, gyroscope, Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE), |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, 1K I2C Serial EEPROM;MicroChip;24LC01AT;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, Six-Axis MEMS Motion Tracking Device;InvenSense;MPU-6050;;1;,,, Pressure Sensor;STMicroelectronics;LPS331AP;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1;,,, 1.7MHz, 1A, Step-Down Converter;ON Semi;NCP1529;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06;;1;,,, Single Positive Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AUC1G74;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver With 3-StateOutput;TI;SN74LVC2G241;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;2;,,, ESD Protection Diodes with LC Voltage;ON Semi;NUP4201MR6;;3;,,, ESD Protection Diode for HDMI;NXP;IP4285CZ9;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 4.2.2, Arch Linux (Arm), Gentoo
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *Expansion connectors
Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE), MicroSD Card slot, Micro HDMI output {{see also|BeagleBoard|List of SBCs}}
==See also== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
